strategy_playbook.case_description: Critical Heat and High Humidity Stress during Lights ON Period

trigger_condition.description: Internal temperature exceeds upper ideal and humidity is above ideal during lights on.

strategy_playbook.diagnosis_and_strategy: Plants at risk of heat stress and fungal infection. Priority is rapid cooling and dehumidification, accepting temporary PPFD reduction.

control_sequence.objective: Rapidly reduce chamber temperature and humidity
control_sequence.justification: Maximize fan speed for cooling and moisture removal; dim LEDs to cut heat load.
control_sequence.exit_condition: T_internal < 22 OR RH_internal < 75 OR after 5 minutes

control_sequence.justification: Maintain strong airflow for humidity control while restoring light for DLI.

strategy_playbook.overall_15min_goal: Goal: T_internal ≤21°C, RH_internal ≤70%. Trade-off: DLI ~20% below target for this interval.

strategy_playbook.case_description: High Temperature and Low Humidity during Lights ON

trigger_condition.description: Temperature high and humidity below lower ideal during lights on.

strategy_playbook.diagnosis_and_strategy: Risk of heat stress and dehydration. Strategy is cooling to ideal temp, then moderate fan to avoid further humidity loss.

control_sequence.objective: Rapidly cool chamber to ideal temperature
control_sequence.justification: Maximize cooling effect; dim LEDs to reduce heat input.

control_sequence.objective: Maintain temperature while limiting humidity loss
control_sequence.justification: Lower fan to reduce desiccation; restore light for photosynthesis.

strategy_playbook.overall_15min_goal: Goal: T_internal within [15–21°C], RH_internal ≥45%. Trade-off: Humidity may remain at lower ideal boundary.

strategy_playbook.case_description: Optimal Temperature but High Humidity during Lights ON

trigger_condition.description: Temperature is within ideal but humidity exceeds ideal during lights on.
trigger_condition.logic: T_internal >= 15 AND T_internal <= 21 AND RH_internal > 70 AND Photoperiod == 'Lights_ON'

strategy_playbook.diagnosis_and_strategy: Risk of mold. Aim to reduce humidity without dropping temperature below ideal. Use fan first, LED secondary.

control_sequence.justification: High airflow removes moisture; maintain LED for PPFD.
Moderate airflow to sustain humidity control; boost LEDs if temp falls below ideal.

strategy_playbook.overall_15min_goal: Goal: RH_internal ≤70%, T_internal ≥15°C. Trade-off: Slight reduction in DLI if LED intensity lowered momentarily.

strategy_playbook.case_description: Low Temperature and High Humidity during Lights OFF

trigger_condition.description: Night period with temperature below ideal night-range and humidity above ideal.

strategy_playbook.diagnosis_and_strategy: Risk of chilling stress and condensation. Use fan to draw warmer external air and dehumidify.

control_sequence.objective: Raise temperature toward night ideal and reduce humidity
control_sequence.justification: Moderate ventilation brings in warmer ambient air and lowers humidity; lights remain off to respect dark cycle.
control_sequence.exit_condition: T_internal > 10 OR RH_internal < 75 OR after 7 minutes

control_sequence.objective: Maximize dehumidification and warming if needed
control_sequence.justification: Full fan capacity to achieve temperature and humidity targets while maintaining dark period.

strategy_playbook.overall_15min_goal: Goal: T_internal ≥10°C, RH_internal ≤70%. Trade-off: Possible overcooling if external drops, monitor next cycle.

strategy_playbook.case_description: Post-Watering Sudden Humidity Spike during Lights ON
strategy_playbook.case_quantitative_description: T_internal = 16°C, RH_internal spikes to 85%, Photoperiod = Lights_ON

trigger_condition.description: Rapid increase in humidity above critical threshold after watering during lights on.

strategy_playbook.diagnosis_and_strategy: High mold risk. Immediate dehumidification while maintaining photosynthesis if possible.

control_sequence.justification: Maximize airflow to remove moisture; dim lights to reduce heat and condensation potential.
Balance humidity control with PPFD recovery.

strategy_playbook.overall_15min_goal: Goal: RH_internal ≤70%, T_internal within [15–21°C]. Trade-off: Slight temporary reduction in DLI.

strategy_playbook.case_description: Optimal Conditions Maintenance during Lights ON

trigger_condition.description: All parameters within ideal ranges during lights on.
trigger_condition.logic: T_internal >= 15 AND T_internal <= 21 AND RH_internal >= 50 AND RH_internal <= 70 AND Photoperiod == 'Lights_ON'

strategy_playbook.diagnosis_and_strategy: Environment optimal; maintain conditions and accumulate DLI with minimal interventions.

control_sequence.objective: Maintain ideal environment and DLI accumulation
control_sequence.justification: Low airflow for circulation; LED at target PPFD (~200 µmol/m²/s) for DLI.

strategy_playbook.overall_15min_goal: Goal: Sustain T_internal within [15–21°C], RH_internal within [50–70%], accumulate DLI ~0.9 mol/m² in 15 min.
